archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.3.2f: f) specialist systems (e.g. the Internet of Things (IoT) or systems that support industrial control systems (including SCADA systems, Distributed Control Systems (DCS) and Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs))).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
